Description: St Paul and St Antony in a cave, visited by a crow bringing them bread; frontispiece to Arnaud d'Andilly's translation of 'Les Vies des saints pères des déserts' (Paris: Veuve Jean Camusat & Pierre Le Petit, 1647); lettered proof. c.1647 Engraving
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (299.II)
Montaiglon 1856 / Catalogue raisonné de l'oeuvre de Claude Mellan (312)
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
Representation of: St Paul the Hermit
Associated titles: Les Vies des saints pères des déserts
